list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Subject line (try to keep under 50 characters)
Multi-line description of commit, feel free to be detailed.
[Ticket: X]
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

task.summary: Default task

Initialize React framework for NotFlix front end.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Implement main App.js Router
TODO: Build out Home, Customer Mgmt, and Content Mgmt sections
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Create framework for Home page
Updated meta and title info on index.html as well.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Mockup Customers.js page
No functionality yet.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Finish mockup of Customers.js
Added a mockup search results table and edit/delete icons.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Added 'AddCustomers' page.
Fixed routing on App.js page. Added Email field on Customers.js under search.
TODO: Consider breaking pages into smaller components and using <Outlet /> elements from react-router-dom?
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Added Search for Series form.
Also created dummy "search results" tables.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Added Edit Customer and Edit Series pages.
Updated links to be more consistently-named and RESTful-ready in App.js
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Added EditEpisode.js file
Double-checked links for functionality.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Finished with html functionality
TODO: a little CSS
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Test deployment build
To run similarly on OSU Engr servers: 1) modify package.json to "homepage" : "https://web.engr.oregonstate.edu/~[YOUR ONID]"
2) run `npm run build` in the local directory
3) Upload the contents of the `build` folder to your public_html folder on the OSU server.
4) run `npm install -g serve` on your flip server
5) run `serve -s build`
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Revised Nav scheme for Customer/series/Episode
Switched to separate pages for Customers / Series / Episodes and revised navbar and routes accordingly.
TODO: Add pages for Genres, Subscriptions, and ContentTypes. TODO: Revise Home page to match when complete.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Implemented revised navigation plan on Subscriptions
Changed Subscriptions and EditSubscription to reflect a different method of handling rendering / navigation.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Update Customer functionality to match Subscriptions
Reworked Search/Edit form and Table components.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Update Episode functionality to match Customers
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Update Series functionality to match rest of site
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Add Genre functionality.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Nav and Homepage CSS
TODO: All page-level <div> wrappers should include classname="page" for basic styling.
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Minor navbar fix
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Updated Form CSS styling
TODO: Buttons, Tables
EJL

Finish Button and Table CSS
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Small file update
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Edited API paths to correct backend.
Sending to notflix-backend.herokuapp.com rather than localhost/{route}
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.

Fixed some Edit issues.
Not sure why edit-individual-item isn't rendering in correctly yet...
EJL
# F2 to save, F4 to close and finish commit.
